data.eml:eml: Redescription of the male of Pikelinia tambilloi (Mello­Leitão, 1941) and its synonymy with Pikelinia toba Ramírez & Grismado, 1997 (Araneae: Filistatidae: Prithinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Grismado, Cristian J., Ramírez, Martín J. (2006): Redescription of the male of Pikelinia tambilloi (Mello­Leitão, 1941) and its synonymy with Pikelinia toba Ramírez & Grismado, 1997 (Araneae: Filistatidae: Prithinae). Zootaxa 1276: 39-45, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.173324
